commit.title: [dune] [ci] [appveyor] Fix and test Dune for Windows.
commit.message:
[dune] [ci] [appveyor] Fix and test Dune for Windows.

We need to tweak some script calls as they need a POSIX shell and
`(run ...)` / `(system ...)` actions use `cmd.exe` on Windows.

Hopefully, we will rely less on `bash` when Dune can understand Coq
libraries. This affects to shell scripts in `kernel/**.sh` for example.

We switch Appveyor testing to Dune. This servers 2 purposes, first,
Dune seems faster on Windows than make, thus we will save CI time,
second, it helps testing Dune support.

commit.title: [dune] [ci] [appveyor] Fix and test Dune for Windows.
commit.message:
[dune] [ci] [appveyor] Fix and test Dune for Windows.

We need to tweak some script calls as they need a POSIX shell and
`(run ...)` / `(system ...)` actions use `cmd.exe` on Windows.

Hopefully, we will rely less on `bash` when Dune can understand Coq
libraries. This affects to shell scripts in `kernel/**.sh` for example.

We switch Appveyor testing to Dune. This servers 2 purposes, first,
Dune seems faster on Windows than make, thus we will save CI time,
second, it helps testing Dune support.
